item.title: Israel Intensifies Strikes in Lebanon Amid Push for Cease-Fire
item.description: The conflict between Israel and Hezbollah has deepened in recent days despite diplomatic efforts to move toward a temporary truce.

item.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s FDA Wish List: Raw Milk, Stem Cells, Heavy Metals
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., one of President-elect Donald J. Trump’s advisers on health, is taking aim at the agency’s oversight on many fronts.

item.title: Archbishop of Canterbury Resigns Over U.K. Church Abuse Scandal
item.description: Justin Welby, the leader of 85 million Anglicans worldwide, announced his resignation days after a report found he had taken insufficient action over ...

item.title: He Thought He Knew Horses. Then He Learned to Really Listen.
item.description: Warwick Schiller made his name as an expert trainer. An enigmatic little horse completely changed his outlook.

item.title: Federal Judge Blocks Louisiana Law Requiring Ten Commandments in Classrooms
item.description: The ruling is likely the first in what could be a long legal fight for conservative Christian groups hoping to amplify public expressions of faith.
